'''''Minecraft: Glide Mini Game (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the sixth soundtrack released for ''Minecraft'' by [[Gareth Coker]], which features music from the [[Glide (mini game)|Glide mini game]]. Originally released as part of the March 29, 2017 update to Legacy Console Edition, the soundtrack was later released on December 22, 2020.
